title: Chapter 4: Human-Robot Interaction
description: In this chapter, we will explore the critical field of Human-Robot Interaction (HRI) and discuss how to design, develop, and evaluate systems that enable natural, intuitive, and safe ways for humans to interact with humanoid robots. As robots move from controlled industrial environments into shared spaces with people, effective HRI becomes paramount. The unique form factor of humanoids often raises expectations for human-like interaction, making HRI design even more crucial.
